title: Authors and Citation
text: Zheng M, Fu H (2024). vse4ts: Identify Memory Patterns Time Series Using VSE. R package version 0.0.0.9001, https://z--cn.github.io/vse4ts/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {vse4ts: Identify Memory Patterns in Time Series Using VSE},   author = {Mengyang Zheng and Hui Fu},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9001},   url = {https://z-my-cn.github.io/vse4ts/}, }

title: Identify Memory Patterns in Time Series Using VSE
text: goal vse4ts identify memory patterns time series using variance scaling exponent. constructs variance scaling exponent, achieving identification memory patterns time series, especially long memory.

title: Identify Memory Patterns in Time Series Using VSE
text: can install development version vse4ts GitHub :

title: Identify Memory Patterns in Time Series Using VSE
text: basic example use vse function vse4ts package: package also provides hypothesis test function vse.test test long memory time series:
code: library(vse4ts) set.seed(123) x <- rnorm(1024) x.vse <- vse(x) print(x.vse) #> [1] 0.4987233 library(vse4ts) set.seed(123) x <- rnorm(1024) x.vse.test <- vse.test(x) print(x.vse.test) #> $statistic #> [1] 29.06849  #> $df #> [1] 31  #> $p.value #> [1] 0.4343341  #> attr(,"class") #> [1] "vsetest"

title: Identify Memory Patterns in Time Series Using VSE
Variance Scale Exponent — vse
text: Calculate variance scaling exponent time series.

title: Variance Scale Exponent — vse
text: x time series vector. m parameter control number scales. Default 0.5.

title: Variance Scale Exponent — vse
text: Fu, H., Chen, W., & , X.-J. (2018). class estimation test long memory. Physica : Statistical Mechanics Applications (Vol. 509, pp. 906–920). Elsevier BV. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.physa.2018.06.092

title: Variance Scale Exponent — vse
code: set.seed(123) x <- rnorm(1024) # Generate a random time series vse(x) #> [1] 0.4987233  # Compare the result with the Hurst exponent library(pracma) data("brown72")  # Load the Brown72 data set hurstexp(brown72) # Calculate the Hurst exponent #> Simple R/S Hurst estimation:         0.6628842  #> Corrected R over S Hurst exponent:   0.7378703  #> Empirical Hurst exponent:            0.6920439  #> Corrected empirical Hurst exponent:  0.6577233  #> Theoretical Hurst exponent:          0.5404756  vse(brown72) # Calculate the variance scaling exponent #> [1] 0.7345032

title: Variance Scale Exponent Test — vse.test
text: Use variance scale exponent method construct hypothesis test long memory time series.

title: Variance Scale Exponent Test — vse.test
text: x time series vector. m parameter control number scales. Default 0.5.

title: Variance Scale Exponent Test — vse.test
text: list class "vsetest" containing following components: statistic value test statistic. df degrees freedom test. p.value p-value test.

title: Variance Scale Exponent Test — vse.test
text: Fu, H., Chen, W., & , X.-J. (2018). class estimation test long memory. Physica : Statistical Mechanics Applications (Vol. 509, pp. 906–920). Elsevier BV. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.physa.2018.06.092

text: Constructing variance scaling exponent, achieves identification memory patterns time series, especially identification long memory.
